body_html:
Hi @InsZVA,
Thanks for your reply.

Even I am also facing the same issue as @kemusa ,

  • I switched to r1.3 and updated the BUID file with the two lines
  • then built libtensorflow.so and copied the built file to /usr/local/lib file in my docker container
  • then ran the bazel command to serve (the random forest code attached above) but again I got
    the same error "Op type not registered XXX".
body_text:
Hi @InsZVA,
Thanks for your reply.
Even I am also facing the same issue as @kemusa ,

I switched to r1.3 and updated the BUID file with the two lines
then built libtensorflow.so and  copied the built file to /usr/local/lib file in my docker container
then ran the bazel command to serve (the random forest code attached above) but again I got
the same error "Op type not registered XXX".
body:
Hi @InsZVA,
Thanks for your reply.

Even I am also facing the same issue as @kemusa ,

- I switched to r1.3 and updated the BUID file with the two lines 
- then built libtensorflow.so and  copied the built file to /usr/local/lib file in my docker container 
-  then ran the bazel command to serve (the random forest code attached above) but again I got 
   the same error "Op type not registered XXX".
